pages.text: 75|20|Kakhano na, baram tomara duniyara jibanake bhalabasa
75|21|ara tomara akheratake upeksa kara [1].
75|22|Sedina kono kono mukhamandala ujjbala habe
75|23|tara tadera rabera dike takiye thakabe [1].
75|24|Ara kono kono mukhamandala haye parabe bibarna
75|25|asanka karabe ye, eka dhbansakari biparyaya tadera upara apatita habe.
75|26|Abasya'i [1], yakhana praana kanthagata habe
75|27|ebam bala habe, ‘ke take raksa karabe?’
75|28|Takhana tara pratyaya habe ye, eta bidayaksana.
75|29|Ara payera gochara sange payera gocha jariye yabe [1].
75|30|Sedina apanara rabera kache'i sakalake hamkiye neya habe.
75|31|Sutaram se bisbasa kare ni ebam salata'o adaya kare ni.
75|32|Baram se mithyaropa karechila ebam mukha phiriye niyechila.
75|33|Tarapara se tara paribara parijanera kache cale giyechila ahankara kare
75|34|durbhoga tomara jan'ya, durbhoga
75|35|abara durbhoga tomara jan'ya, durbhoga [1]
75|36|manusa ki mane kare ye, take emani chere deya habe [1]
75|37|se ki biryera sthalita sukrabindu chila na
75|38|tarapara se ‘alaka’ya parinata haya. Atahpara allah take srsti karena ebam suthama karena.
75|39|Atahpara tini ta theke srsti karena yugala--- nara o nari.
75|40|Tabu'o ki se srasta mrtake punarjibita karate saksama nana [1]
76|1|kalaprabahe manusera upara ki emana eka samaya ase ni [1] yakhana se ullekhayogya kichu'i chila na [2]
76|2|amara to manusake srsti karechi milita sukrabindu theke [1], amara take pariksa karaba [2]; ta'i amara take karechi srabana o drstisakti sampanna [3].
76|3|Niscaya amara take patha nirdesa diyechi, haya se krtajna habe, na haya se akrtajna habe [1].
76|4|Niscaya amara kapheradera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi sekala, galara beri o lelihana aguna [1].
76|5|Niscaya satkarmasilera [1] pana karabe emana purnapatra-paniya theke yara misrana habe kaphura [2]
